DOC.brief_summary: The study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to assess glycaemic control while using liraglutide under normal clinical practice conditions in Belgium.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study on Effectiveness and Safety of Liraglutide in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Insufficiently controlled after 3 months of treatment with OADs (oral antidiabetic drugs) Previously treated with liraglutide Hypersensitivity to liraglutide or to any of the excipients (Disodium phosphate dihydrate, propylene glycol, phenol, water for injections) Pregnant, breast feeding or have the intention of becoming pregnant
